hooks.command: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/log -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"taskId":"claude-session","level":"debug","message":"Tool: '"$TOOL_NAME"' completed"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3000/agent/done -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"taskId":"claude-session","summary":"Session ended"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
